name: scada-system
description: Cross-platform SCADA system for oil pipeline

scripts.build:mobile: cd crossplatform && flutter build apk && flutter build ios
scripts.build:desktop: cd crossplatform && flutter build windows && flutter build linux && flutter build macos
scripts.build:all: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:mobile && npm run build:desktop
scripts.setup:all: npm run setup:backend && npm run setup:frontend && npm run setup:flutter
scripts.test:all: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend && npm run test:flutter

author: MainFrame
